item.description:
Entrain is a reggea/funk band. Epic in sound and kaleidoscopic in vision, the eclectic Martha's Vineyard-based six piece Entrain has been thrilling critics and fans alike since it's inception. With their infectious world grooves and twirling jams, Entrain has been around since 1993. Their collective resume includes stints with such diverse players as Chuck Berry, Flor De Cana, Southside Johnny, Gil Scott-Heron, Carly Simon and NRBQ.

Johnny Ds has $18 cover. Very crowded so get there early before 9:30PM! Band starts at 10PM. 17 Holland St. Somerville. Davis Square T stop on the Red Line
item.name: Entrain @Johnny D's
